# nodeshift_vpc (Resource)

Manages a VPC



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `ip_range` (String) IP range of the VPC
- `name` (String) Name of the VPC

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the VPC

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) String ID of the VPC, computed
